comments_since_last_sample.body: I don't really understand why you need the SNES/GameCube in the mix when you already have the GameBoys. Can't you just use the GameBoy as intended to take your Pocket Camera pictures? Just options?

Good on ya for attacking Nintendo with their stupid expansion service. I can just EMULATE that shit better without having to pay *_ANYTHING!!_* Oh animal crossing fans are screaming and kicking down my door? Then why can't we have that expansion pack _SEPARATE_ from the "Expansion service"?! My God if money is what you're clamboring to make, stick to the mobile phone market and microtrans for that, not for your mainline console! The Switch isn't an overgrown smartphone like you *_DESIGNED_* it with that intention!
